snippet.title: Koa and the Five Pirates of Mara - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description: Join Koa and her best friend Napopo on an action-packed adventure through the islands of Mara. Watch the trailer to see gameplay, the bright world, traps to navigate, and more from this upcoming game where you help Koa and Napopo on their quest to recover stolen pirate loot.
